title: Question 22
prompt:
Sentence 9: The firm will be implementing a dry cleaning service for his employees, but employees should only use this service for their business suits.

Which correction should be made to sentence 9?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The pronoun “his” refers to a male. In this sentence, the pronoun refers to the noun “the firm,” which is not male. The correct pronoun must match the noun that it’s referring to. “The firm” is a singular, neutral noun, so the pronoun should be a singular, neutral pronoun: its.
The firm will be implementing a dry cleaning service for its employees, but employees should only use this service for their business suits.
